alert.note: Alert for Choctaw (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 2:55PM CDT until May 19 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHOCTAW COUNTY... At 255 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Sawyer, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Hugo... Sawyer... Raymond Gary State Park... Grant... Ord... Fallon... Huskey... Frogville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tulsa.
